File src/yajl/yajl_common.h

Common declarations to allow the client to use a custom allocator.

Included in: src/yajl/yajl_gen.h

Included Files

  • #include </usr/include/stddef.h>

Typedef yajl_malloc_func

A pointer to a malloc() function.

typedef void* (*yajl_malloc_func)(void* ctx,size_t sz)

Typedef yajl_free_func

A pointer to a free() function.

typedef void (*yajl_free_func)(void* ctx,void* ptr)

Typedef yajl_realloc_func

A pointer to a realloc() function.

typedef void* (*yajl_realloc_func)(void* ctx,void* ptr,size_t sz)

Typedef yajl_alloc_funcs

A structure which can be passed to yajl_*_alloc routines to allow the client to specify memory allocation functions to be used.

typedef struct {...} yajl_alloc_funcs

struct  
   {  
      yajl_malloc_func malloc; pointer to a function that can allocate uninitialized memory
      yajl_realloc_func realloc; pointer to a function that can resize memory allocations
      yajl_free_func free; pointer to a function that can free memory allocated using the (*.realloc)() function or the (*.malloc)() function
      void* ctx; a context pointer that will be passed to each of the above allocation routines
   }
